channel.title: Convictscape © V.1 Dev. Team
channel.description:
[center][i][u][b][size=20pt]Convictscape ©V.1 Dev. Team[/size][/b][/u][/i][/center] As people have Heard of not many I will start making a server Named ConvictScape The forums Are currently In maintenance but you can still sign up!Thanks to fr33sc4p3 for getting Nationvoice working for me(I gave him My account details) So here are the forums www.convictscape.nationvoice.com/smf I also need forum editers So remeber to Sign up! [u] The server info[/u] convictscape.no-ip.org port:5555 or 43594 not decided yet
Owner:masterp00n Admins:Thug life(owner of fr33sc4p3) Mod:none at the moment
[u]Forums info:[/u] URL:www.convictscape.nationvoice.com/smf Owner:masterp00n Developer:Thug life(owner of fr33sc4p3) Admins:Thug life Elite Moderators:none Super Moderators:none Community members:Nfd1025
[center][size=15pt][u]Coders[/u][/size][/center] [center][i]~eekz~ ~O M G~ ~open~ ~open~[/i][/center] [center][size=15pt][u]Clientcoders[/u][/size][/center] [center][i]~open~ ~O M G~ ~open~ ~open~[/i][/center]
[center][size=15pt][u][i]Forum Developers/Graphics/Web designer[/i][/u][/size][/center] [center][i]~devull~ ~O M G~ ~open~[/i][/center]
[center][size=15pt][u][i]Host[/i][/u][/size][/center] [center][i]~open~ ~open~(just incase)[/i][/center]
Thanks Here is the signup form
[code][code][u][i][b]Coder exp: Some tuts made: What part you wanna be: Why should I choose you?[/b][/i][/u][/code][/code]
Also remember to join my forums www.convictscape.nationvoice.com/smf[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 11:52:04 PM[/size][hr]Im sorry everyone I gave you the wrong link it is www.convictscape.nationvoice.com/smf

item.title: Convictscape © V.1 Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @boy82 boy82
item.description:
@boy82 wrote:

Coder exp: I had made a server called XanderScape, i though it was a great pk server, with no lag, sadly not much people pkd and followed the rules so i shut it down. I will soon re-opening it sometime.

Some tuts made: I made a tut on how to make a good forum, i cannot find it now but i did get support.

What part you wanna be: Forum Developers/Graphics/Web designer

Why should I choose you?: I had been making forums for many years. I know where to find great codes for the forums. I know where to get good skins, buttons, changing name colours, making ranks and other stuff. I had been able to make my own banners using a great graphic program. Until i got a new computer, so i will soon be downloading it again. Now Web Designing, i tried many other programs for web designing but i cant find great ones. I tried freewebs but i just didnt get it. If you dont want me in Web Designing, ill understand. Just forums im great at. I could make some good graphics too.

Ty.

Morgan~

Read full topic

item.title: Convictscape © V.1 Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @masterp00n masterp00n
item.description:
@masterp00n wrote:

You never signed up…[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 07:42:33 PM[/size][hr][quote=“O M G, post:8, topic:72903”]Coder exp: I’ve coded three servers, I have my own, with over 300 members, all of them (seriously, everyone one of them) telling me it’s awesome
Some tuts made: Only one, but it’s big, took me three hours. Sadly, I can’t find it. I’ve looked EVERWHERE, if you’d like I can PM it to you
What part you wanna be: All except hoster
Why should I choose you? I like developing and coding, and I like doing graphics.

Extra: For any web coding, I know some PHP and JavaScript, and I almost fully understand HTML[/quote]
oops sorry I didnt know you signed up accepted :D[br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2007, 07:43:30 PM[/size][hr]Any more people wanna signup?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 02, 2007, 09:43:42 PM[/size][hr]OH come on no one wants to sign up? Cmon This server hopefully will be Awesome

Read full topic

item.title: Convictscape © V.1 Dev. Team
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Coder exp: I’ve coded three servers, I have my own, with over 300 members, all of them (seriously, everyone one of them) telling me it’s awesome
Some tuts made: Only one, but it’s big, took me three hours. Sadly, I can’t find it. I’ve looked EVERWHERE, if you’d like I can PM it to you
What part you wanna be: All except hoster
Why should I choose you? I like developing and coding, and I like doing graphics.

Extra: For any web coding, I know some PHP and JavaScript, and I almost fully understand HTML
